name: Heart of Light
effects: Increase resistance to Dark by 50% for 3 turns to all allies
Increase resistance to Petrify by 100% for all allies for 3 turns

desc_short: Boost dark resistance and resistance to stone for all allies

Augmente la rés. aux ténèbres et à la pétrification de tous les alliés
Erhöht Dunkelresistenz und Resistenz gegen Stein, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. a oscuridad y piedra a todos los aliados
desc_long: Boosts dark resistance and resistance to stone for all allies.
